# Request for Information: Hosting Strategy

## Tender Overview

Publication date: March 20, 2024

Tender Closing Date: April 17, 2024 10:00:00 AM (EST)

The Government of Canada is seeking input from industry to inform the development of an optimized hosting strategy for its applications, workloads, and data. This Request for Information (RFI) aims to gather insights from private sector vendors on best practices, trade-offs, and constraints associated with hosting placement decisions.

## Industry Engagement

Shared Service Canada, the primary application hosting provider for the Government of Canada, invites vendors to submit written feedback via email to [pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:pvrprotectedcloudarfnuageprotege@ssc-spc.gc.ca). The feedback should focus on the key factors, methods, and constraints that vendors consider when selecting hosting placements for workloads. Specifically, the Government of Canada is interested in understanding how vendors balance considerations such as:

* Cost savings
* Security
* Agility
* Scalability
* Time-to-market
* Customer experience

## Consultations

The Government of Canada reserves the right to organize one-on-one or group consultations with vendors who have responded to this RFI. Consultations are planned to take place between May 1, 2024, and May 31, 2024.
